speaker: Doctor
text: Good morning, Mr. Thompson. How have you been feeling lately with your current medications?

speaker: Patient
text: Morning, Doctor. I've been okay, but I noticed some swelling in my ankles again.

speaker: Doctor
text: I see. That could be related to your furosemide. Have you been taking it as prescribed?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, I take it every morning, but sometimes I feel like it doesn't work as well as it used to.

speaker: Doctor
text: Given your kidney function, we might need to adjust the dose. Have you had any issues with dizziness or lightheadedness?

speaker: Patient
text: Not really, just the swelling and sometimes I feel a bit tired.
